document_data.name: Fidilee Fallowfield
document_data.mainbody: dilee had white hair tied back into a bun. She wore a black and white dress.
document_data.Description: Fidilee had white hair tied back into a bun. She wore a black and white dress.
document_data.History: During the [[Sschindylryn invasion of Eveningstar]], Fidilee met [[adventurer]]s and exhorted them to save the town.
